publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-258.1 Mr Alex Salmond: Working Together in Europe—As an amendment to motion (S1M-258) in the name of Donald Dewar, leave out from "Scottish Executive’s " to end and insert "view that Scotland should play an active and positive role within the European Union; recognises that our full participation in the EU and early entry into the Euro is vital to business and jobs and the future economic success and prosperity of Scotland, and believes that Scottish businesses, communities and families will be best served by an independent Scotland playing its full and proper role in the EU."
